21:06 <ssavi> sdumitriu: Hi  
21:08 <ssavi> sdumitriu:How to add a menu item in XWikiPreferences page?  
21:08 <ssavi> Like Look and feel, Configuration, Extension Manager..  
21:09 <ssavi> Solr Search has multiple configuration items.  
21:09 <@sdumitriu> ssavi: Hi  
21:10 <ssavi> would like to give it a try by keeping a seperate gui.  
21:12 <@sdumitriu> http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Administration+Application#HMakingyourapplicationeasilyconfigurablewithConfigurableClass28SinceEnterprise2.3M129  
21:12 <jvelo> has joined #xwiki  
21:13 <ssavi> sdumitriu: Thanks a lot. It is so helpful :)  
21:31 <ssavi> sdumitriu: Am able to create a section. How to create a category like Extension Manager.  
21:31 <ssavi> I have multiple sections under search.  
21:33 <@sdumitriu> ssavi: You can't create categories yet  
21:33 <ssavi> ok  
21:34 <ssavi> Thanks  
21:38 <ssavi> sdumitriu: how can i access the object values configured in the preferences page from the java code ? Is there any component for that ?  
21:40 <ssavi> has left #xwiki  
21:40 <ssavi> has joined #xwiki  
21:41 <ssavi> sdumitriu: how can i access the object values configured in the preferences page from the java code ? Is there any component for that ?  
21:42 <ssavi> Got disconnected, so posted again.  
21:50 <@sdumitriu> ssavi: Nothing specific, but you should just use the document model bridge  
21:50 <@sdumitriu> They're just standard XWiki objects  
21:51 <cjd\_> is now known as <cjd>
